meanings.definition: Ovalbumins: proteins found in egg whites.
meanings.sent1: The ovalbumins in egg whites help provide structure to baked goods.
meanings.sent2: Chefs often use ovalbumins in recipes to add protein to dishes.
meanings.sent3: Why did the egg refuse to fight? It didn't want to get beaten by the ovalbumins!
meanings.sent4: The ovalbumins in egg whites are like the building blocks that hold everything together.
meanings.sent5: When you whisk egg whites, the ovalbumins help create fluffy peaks.

meanings.definition: Ovalbumins: a type of allergen found in eggs.
meanings.sent1: Some people may develop allergies to ovalbumins in eggs.
meanings.sent2: Doctors can test for ovalbumins allergies through skin prick tests.
meanings.sent3: Why did the egg go to school? To learn how to avoid the ovalbumins bullies!
meanings.sent4: For those allergic to ovalbumins, eggs can be like hidden landmines.
meanings.sent5: Avoiding foods with ovalbumins is crucial for those with egg allergies.
